title: Designing a Contextual Side Panel for AI Management Platform
description: Redesigned an internal AI management system by introducing a contextual side panel that allows users to access detailed AI requisition data without losing context. The design improved data visibility, streamlined workflow, and set a scalable pattern for future AI tools.

title: Designing a Modular AI Collaboration System
description: Developed a modular AI workspace enabling users to build Agent-specific chat environments powered by unique system prompts and dedicated data sources. Enhanced control, collaboration, and governance through structured access levels and scalable workspace hierarchies.

title: Project Management Hub — Unified Workflow Dashboard
description: Designed a centralized dashboard that connects projects, functionalities, and resources like Figma, SQL, and API flows — streamlining visibility and collaboration across design and development teams.

title: EngineSight — Fleet & Engine Performance Dashboard
description: Designed a unified performance dashboard for monitoring fleet and engine efficiency. Streamlined data visualization enabled teams to track health, performance, and maintenance with clarity and precision.
